name: Markham Southwell

trait.name: Roleplaying Information
text: Sheriff Markham of Bryn Shander is a brawny, likable man of few words. Nothing is more important to him than protecting Icewind Dale. He judges others by their actions, not their words.
Ideal: "All people deserve to be treated with dignity."
Bond: "Duvessa is a natural leader, but she needs help. That's my job."
Flaw: "I bury my emotions and have no interest in small talk."

action.name: Longsword
text: Melee Weapon Attack: +4 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. 6 (1d8 + 2) slashing damage, or 7 (1d10 + 2) slashing damage if used with two hands.

action.name: Heavy Crossbow
text: Ranged Weapon Attack: +3 to hit, range 100/400 ft., one target. 6 (1d10 + 1) piercing damage. Markham carries twenty crossbow bolts.

description:
Sheriff Markham of Bryn Shander is a brawny, likable man of few words. Nothing is more important to him than protecting Icewind Dale. He judges others by their actions, not their words.
